premise_source_doc_sentence: In film , Hall has portrayed the lead roles of President Richard Nixon in Robert Altman 's Secret Honor  (  1984  )  , Arthur Pratt in Duck  (  2005  )  , and Sydney in Paul Thomas Anderson 's Hard Eight  (  1996  )  , later collaborating with Anderson on Boogie Nights  (  1997  )  and Magnolia  (  1999  )  .

claim: Paul Thomas Anderson directed Boogie Nights in 1997.
